## Discussion

Apple Watch Ultra automatically records these samples during dive sessions.

Underwater depth samples use length units (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit]) and measure discrete values (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityAggregationStyle]). # underwaterDepth

**Type Property**

A quantity sample that records a person’s depth underwater.

## Declaration

```swift
static let underwaterDepth: HKQuantityTypeIdentifier
```

## Discussion

Apple Watch Ultra automatically records these samples during dive sessions.

Underwater depth samples use length units (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit]) and measure discrete values (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityAggregationStyle]). Sample data may be condensed and/or coalesced by HealthKit. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/accessing-condensed-workout-samples].

## Diving

- **waterTemperature**: A quantity sample that records the water temperature.

items.description: A quantity sample that records the water temperature.
